posts.post_content:
Looking for commons in 6 or better, stars in 4 or better. Open to rare backs.

I am not looking for printing variations or errors, scraps, double names etc.

Please let me know what you have.

Thank you,

Sean
I'll take any left over scraps:D;)

Sean,
My set is #21 in the registry. I've decided to sell most of them. The Southern Leaguer's and Cubs I'm keeping. Maybe there is something there you like. Call me for back scans and prices.
Mike......   760-952-1818 or [url]gmryan9@msn.com[/url]
